register.description: IP Revision Identifier (X.Y.R)Used by software to track features, bugs, and compatibility

bitfield.description: IP Revision

register.description: Information about the IP module's hardware configuration, i.e. typically the module's HDL generics (if any).Actual field format and encoding is decided by the module's designer.

bitfield.description: IP module hardware configuration

register.description: This register allows controlling various parameters of the L4_CFG interface

bitfield.description: Master interface power management, standby/wait control
Slave interface power management, request/acknowledgement control
Sensitivity to emulation (debug) suspend input signal

bitenum.description: module is sensitive to emulation suspend
module is not sensitive to emulation suspend

bitfield.description: Software reset
Internal interface clock gating strategy

bitenum.description: automatic interface clock gating strategy, based on interconnect interface activity

register.description: Status on module, (reset done on bit 0, available for more status info)

bitfield.description: Internal reset monitoring

bitenum.description: internal reset is completed and the module is ready to be used

register.description: IRQ status register for FIFO (8..15) events and for port p break, wake and error events. Events will signal interrupt for DSP line r (Dspirq_r)Read 0: event has not occurredRead 1: event has occurredWrite 0: bit stays unchangedWrite 1: bit gets reset to 0

bitfield.description: Wake detected on any channel 8..15
Break detected on any channel 8..15
Error detected on any channel 8..15
Data overrun in real time mode channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15).
Data received on channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15)
Data transmitted on channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: IRQ enable register for FIFO (8..15) events and for port p break, wake and error events signaled to DSP line r (Dspirq_r)Write 0: event is maskedWrite 1: event is enabled

bitfield.description: Wake interrupt enable for all channels 8..15
Break interrupt enable for all channels 8..15
Error interrupt enable for all channels 8..15
Overrun interrupt enable for channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15)
Data available interrupt enable for channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15)
Data accepted interrupt enable for channel 8..15 (LSB stands for channel 8 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: Programmed wake state for each channel, in port 10x0: no channel wakeup on WAKE line requested0x1: channel wakeup requested

bitfield.description: Channel 0..15 (LSB stands for channel 0 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: Clear register for programmed wake state on port 1 HST_WAKE for each channel0x0: no effect0x1: clears bit

bitfield.description: Channel 0..15 (LSB stands for channel 0 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: Set function for wake state for each channel, in port 10x0: no effect0x1: sets bit

bitfield.description: READY default level
Sets 3 wires behavior

bitenum.description: sets 4 wires behavior (wakeup with WAKE signal)
sets 3 wire behavior (wakeup on line activity without WAKE signal)

bitfield.description: Sets programmed WAKE state for channel i

register.description: Programmed wake state for each channel, in port 20x0: no channel wakeup on WAKE line requested0x1: channel wakeup requested

bitfield.description: Channel 0..15 (LSB stands for channel 0 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: Clear register for programmed wake state on port 2 HST_WAKE for each channel0x0: no effect0x1: clears bit

bitfield.description: Channel 0..15 (LSB stands for channel 0 and MSB for channel 15)

register.description: Set function for wake state for each channel, in port 20x0: no effect0x1: sets bit

bitfield.description: READY default level
Sets 3 wires behavior

bitenum.description: sets 4 wires behavior (wakeup with WAKE signal)
sets 3 wire behavior (wakeup on line activity without WAKE signal)

bitfield.description: Sets programmed WAKE state for channel i

register.description: Global Control Register: suspend and clock gating

bitfield.description: DMA clock autogating enable
DMA global clock control

register.description: DMA software reset control register

bitfield.description: DMA sw reset control bit

bitenum.description: writing 1 resets the DMA. It is automatically reset to 0 by hardware once software reset is done
